about.title: About RVI
about.subtitle: A Non-Profit Institute Dedicated to RWA Research & Ecosystem Development
about.desc: RVI is an Australia-based non-profit organisation focused on advancing the future of digital finance through rigorous research and global collaboration.
about.quote: We believe: Real value should be seen, trusted, and accessible globally.

ecosystem.title: Ecosystem
ecosystem.desc: Coordinating an ecosystem of institutions, regulators, asset owners, and technology providers.

compliance.title: Compliance
compliance.desc: Supporting compliant, transparent and sustainable asset tokenization.

strategy.title: The Strategic Rationale
strategy.desc: Unlocking global value by connecting Australia's premium assets with Asia's dynamic capital through a trusted RWA framework.

rwa.title: Why RWA?
rwa.intro: The world is entering the era of “value-backed digital finance.”
list: Transparent, auditable, legally compliant investment models
Lower risk and higher trust through regulatory alignment
rwa.outro: RWA is not a technology revolution — it is a trust revolution.

australia.title: Why Australia?
australia.intro: Australia offers one of the world’s strongest environments for regulated RWA.
australia.outro: These assets are: Stable, transparent, auditable, well-regulated — ideal for tokenisation.

asia.title: Why Asia?
asia.intro: Asia is the fastest-growing capital region globally.
asia.outro: Australia supplies the assets. / Asia supplies the capital. RVI builds the bridge.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.desc: To build a neutral, trusted platform for global RWA standardisation.
list: A bridge between Australia and Asia
A promoter of compliant and transparent tokenisation frameworks

research.title: RWA Research & Standards Development
list: Standardisation of asset authenticity & on-chain verification

ecosystem.title: Ecosystem Collaboration
list: Partner with institutions across the value chain
Create the RWFF (Real World Finance Forum) alliance
Connect regulated service providers, asset owners & capital partners

bridge.title: Australia ↔ Asia Cross-Border Bridge
list: Help Asian institutions understand Australian assets
Help Australian industry understand RWA compliance frameworks
Facilitate compliant issuance & asset tokenisation pilot programs

partners.title: Global Partnerships
partners.desc: Collaborating with leaders across the digital and physical asset spectrum.
partners.rwffDesc: The Real World Finance Forum serves as the premier cross-border alliance, uniting industry leaders to enable seamless collaboration.

join.title: Global Ecosystem & Partnerships
join.subtitle: Connecting the leaders of the real-world asset revolution.
join.rolesDesc: Whether you are building the future of finance or managing world-class assets, RVI invites you to shape the future of real-world asset tokenisation.
join.formDesc: Join our network of industry leaders and pioneers.

founder.name: Henry Xu
founder.quote1: Australia holds some of the world’s most stable, transparent and high-quality assets, and they deserve global visibility.
founder.quote2: Our mission is not speculation but long-term, standards-based, regulatory-aligned industry development.
founder.quote3: RVI is here to help build a healthier, more transparent and trusted global RWA ecosystem.
